Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for a couple months now... and I think I'm developing an obsession for struts. I see them everywhere now!

The apsis of this strut obsession was last week when I went with the family to see the leaning tower of Pisa in Italy... and guess what was holding some sections of it? STRUTS!

So I made this:

http://imgur.com/juoWwBg
Temporal Leak detected. Emergency Anti-portal boosters activate.
